spells.name: Contagion, Greater
spells.description: Infect a subject with a magical disease.

spells.name: Curse, Major
spells.description: As bestow curse, but harder to remove.

spells.name: Curse of Disgust
spells.description: Target is sickened while viewing trigger.

spells.name: Smug Narcissism
spells.description: Target is distracted by its sense of self.
